Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RmiClient, SocketClient
    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class represent a client regardless of the type of connection (Rmi or Socket)

        private static boolean isValidIp​(java.lang.String input)
        Checks if a string is a valid ip.

        Returns:

      • isValidPort

        private static int isValidPort​(java.lang.String port)
        Checks if a string contains a valid port number.
        Parameters:
        port - is the string to be checked
        Returns:
        the port converted to integer if the result of check is positive, -1 otherwise

        Sets the user interface.

        public void run()
        Runs the client. It is override by subclasses.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • manageMessage

        java.lang.String manageMessage​(java.lang.String gsonCoded)
        Recognizes the type of the message coming from server.
        Parameters:
        gsonCoded - is the gson-coded string that wraps the message during transfer
        Returns:
        the answer to be sent to server

      • manageIpAndPortInsertion

        void manageIpAndPortInsertion()
        Manages when user types ip and port number, checking if they are valid values.

      • isServerReachable

        boolean isServerReachable()
        Says is the server is reachable. Because this class cannot manage communication until the technology is chosen (rmi or socket), it returns always false.
        Returns:
        false because no server is reachable from this class

      • isClientReady

        boolean isClientReady()
        Returns true if the client is ready to manage communication.
        Returns:
        true if the client is ready

      • stop

        public void stop()
        It is override by subclasses.
